thread.title: Gunmen Stormed A Quebec City Mosque During Prayer Service, Killing Multiple People
thread.title_full: Gunmen Stormed A Quebec City Mosque During Prayer Service, Killing Multiple People

author: Kimberly Ricci
title: Gunmen Stormed A Quebec City Mosque During Prayer Service, Killing Multiple People

organizations.name: quebec city mosque during prayer service

text:
JUST IN: Video shows police in Quebec City responding to reports of deadly shooting at Mosque. https://t.co/OfIp2Nx1u9 pic.twitter.com/KPeDuZD4V4 
â€” ABC News (@ABC) January 30, 2017 
This ABC News clip shows the immediate police response outside a mosque in Quebec City, where multiple gunmen entered a mosque during prayer service and opened fire. Forty worshipers were said to be in attendance when the massacre began, and according to the mosque president (who spoke with Reuters ), at least five people were killed.
(Via Reuters )
